input.sentences: i accidentally took a picture of my hand .
we posed outside with the baby .
we set her down and she was one happy baby .
output.sentences: I took a picture of my hand instead of the menu accidentally.
Here's a picture of us posed with the baby outside the restaurants waiting for the rest of the family.
Mother arrived in another car, everyone else was late because they had to stop to get gas.
The baby didn't care, she was having a splendid time by herself.
She's the only baby I know who is happier when you set her down, I swear.
